properties.Descriptio: Oya from the starting point of Ohiya village to Ohiya bridge
properties.Observatio: During the rainy season when too much water flows, Bank erosion occurs
properties.Descript_1:
Arrange stone packing-rubble packing-River bank

Vegetative cover improving along the river bank Areca nut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings and planting at 3.5m x 3.5 m grid
